allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Video Formats Converter v1.0.0

Features:
- Aspect ratio conversion \(16:9, 9:16, 1:1, 4:5\)
- Format conversion \(MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, WebM\)
- Transform modes \(fit, fill, stretch\)
- CLI with quick commands \(portrait, landscape, square\)
- Web dashboard with real-time progress
- Batch conversion support

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(wmic process where "name like ''%VideoConvert%'' or name like ''%electron%''" get processid,name)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add marketing website for VideoConvert

Features:
- Next.js 16 with App Router and Tailwind CSS
- 11 pages: Home, Features, Pricing, Download, Demo, Docs, Blog, About, Contact, Privacy, Terms
- Interactive demo with simulated video conversion
- Newsletter signup forms
- Blog system with 3 initial posts
- Responsive dark theme matching the app
- Deployed to Vercel

Also includes:
- Marketing launch plan
- Updated .gitignore to exclude .next build artifacts

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add feedback form and website links

Website:
- Add /feedback page with bug report, feature request, and general feedback form
- Star rating, feedback type selector, platform/version fields
- Add Feedback link to footer navigation
- Update APP_URL to videoconvert.video

App:
- Add footer links to Website, Feedback, and Docs
- Style footer links with hover effects

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
